name: Manu Laguna
description: I'm Manu Laguna, a seasoned iOS developer with over 6 years of experience specializing in Swift, UIKit, and SwiftUI. I create innovative, user-centric applications that prioritize performance, accessibility, and scalability. Explore my portfolio to discover projects that showcase my expertise in mobile development, API integration, and cross-platform solutions. With a passion for clean code and efficient problem-solving, I deliver high-quality software that meets business needs and enhances user experiences.
